content:
# `prefect version`

```command  theme={null}
prefect version [OPTIONS]
```

<Info>
  Get the current Prefect version and integration information.
</Info>

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="Options" defaultOpen>
    <ResponseField name="--omit-integrations">
      Omit integration information
    </ResponseField>
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>
